message:
Great explanation of permutation tests... I have to agree, the textbook explanation never really hit it home for me, this is much better.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5Dnw46eC-0o

Also, the Wikipedia page is a great read: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Resampling_(statistics)
story: Mohamed Alaa El Din shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
